snippet: Shares in Pfizer were up slightly on Thursday after the drug maker announced that it planned to take its animal health unit public rather than sell it.
abstract: Shares in Pfizer were up slightly on Thursday after the drug maker announced that it planned to take its animal health unit public rather than sell it.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Pfizer Confirms Spinoff of Animal Health Unit
